resources.string: To prevent misreporting of repeated calls or dialed-back numbers, reporting number requires call log permission.

Some apps run extra foreground services, input the service names here to exclude them.

To find a service name:
  1. Activate the service in that app.
  2. All activated service names will appear here.

For example, if a service name is com.app.FGCalling.Service, you can simply input FGCalling to exclude it.
You can enter multiple names, separated by commas.
